title: Medical Practical Skills Enhancement: Gamification-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve workplace-linked mathematical problems in gamified environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can self-correct errors using in-game feedback systems and successfully retry over 70% of problems
Learners can successfully perform collaborative problem-solving strategies more than four times through team-based quest assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
